sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
  'INSERT INTO dbo.load_logs ',
  '(tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) ',
  'VALUES (',
  '''', item().tablename, ''', ',
  activity('cp_full_load').output.rowsCopied, ', ',
  if(
    equals(item().watermark, null),
    'NULL',
    concat('''', item().watermark, '''')
  ),
  ', SYSDATETIME()',
  ');'
)

@concat(
  'INSERT INTO dbo.load_logs ',
  '(tablename, numberofrowscopied, watermarkcolumnname, loaddate) ',
  'VALUES (',
  '''', item().tablename, ''', ',
  activity('cp_incremental').output.rowsCopied, ', ',
  concat('''', item().watermark, ''''),
  ', SYSDATETIME()',
  ');'
)

activities.name: if_checkFileExtension
activities.description: if file is csv migrate to cloud data lake

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM dbo.FactBookings
WHERE booking_date > '@{activity('LastLoad').output.firstRow.lastload}'
AND booking_date <= '@{activity('LatestLoad').output.firstRow.latestLoad}'
SELECT MAX(booking_date) as latestLoad FROM dbo.FactBookings
